task-complete.command: mkdir -p logs && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] ✅ Task completed: {task_name}" >> logs/tasks.log && osascript -e 'display notification "Task: {task_name}" with title "✅ CCI Task Complete"'
task-complete.description: Notifies when an AI agent completes a task

tests-passed.command: mkdir -p logs && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] 🧪 All tests passed" >> logs/tests.log && osascript -e 'display notification "All tests passed successfully" with title "🧪 CCI Tests Passed"'

uat-ready.command: mkdir -p logs && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] 🎯 UAT Ready" >> logs/uat.log && git log --oneline -5 >> logs/uat.log && osascript -e 'display notification "Code is ready for User Acceptance Testing" with title "🎯 CCI UAT Ready" sound name "Glass"'
uat-ready.description: Notifies when code is ready for user acceptance testing

security-check.command: mkdir -p logs && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] 🔒 Security scan complete" >> logs/security.log

build-success.command: mkdir -p logs && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] 📦 Build successful" >> logs/build.log && osascript -e 'display notification "Package built successfully" with title "📦 CCI Build Success"'

coverage-report.command: mkdir -p logs && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] 📊 Coverage report generated" >> logs/coverage.log && uv run pytest --cov=cci --cov-report=term-missing --quiet 2>&1 | tail -10 >> logs/coverage.log

error-occurred.command: mkdir -p logs && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] ❌ Error: {error_message}" >> logs/errors.log && osascript -e 'display notification "{error_message}" with title "❌ CCI Error" sound name "Basso"'

deployment-complete.command: mkdir -p logs && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] 🚀 Deployment complete: v{version}" >> logs/deployment.log && osascript -e 'display notification "Version {version} deployed successfully" with title "🚀 CCI Deployed" sound name "Hero"'
